fr.tetris.piece

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.tetris.piece.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PieceI, PieceJ, PieceL, PieceO, PieceS, PieceT, PieceZ

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe abstraite de laquelle toutes les pièces héritent.
